alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Dale; Henry (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 1:51PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Dale, northern Henry and Coffee Counties through 230 PM CDT... At 150 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Richards Crossroads to near Ariton to near Elba. Movement was southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Elba, Abbeville, Enterprise, Fort Rucker, Ozark, Level Plains, Newton, New Brockton, Ariton, Lee, Kinston, Mixons Crossroads, Hunt Field, Curtis, Carl Folsom A/p, Hooper Stage Field, Camp Humming Hills, Clintonville, Ewell and Dale County Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
